website_summaries.verdict: If copper doesn't catch your eye, consider this handcrafted, 2-tone titanium bracelet with magnets in each link. It's so attractive that no one will ever guess it's therapeutic.
pros: Each link contains a 3,500 G magnet
Comes with elegant velvet gift bag, box, and link-removal tool
cons: The resizing tool that comes with the bracelet can be a challenge to use

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I first bought the man's version for my husband who has struggled with arthritis pain in his hand. It's worked great for him with no other changes in diet or meds. Then I bought them for my parents who have also experienced a reduction of pain in their wrists and fingers since wearing them. They are nice looking bracelets that go with everything and just look like jewelry. Came with tool to easily remove chains to fit your wrist. Love this product and highly recommend. I actually just bought 2 for my sisters bc they've heard so much positive feedback from the rest of my family.
customer_reviews.author: Designer20

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I love my new bracelet. I so appreciated the email with detailed directions on how to remove links....very helpful. I had to remove three. The little tool worked great. The bracelet looks like a fine piece of jewelry. It's so smooth and lightweight, I hardly realize I have it on. It's a little time consuming putting it on and taking it off due to the clasp, but having said that, I'd rather have that than have a cheap clasp. The clasp really "clicks shut" nicely. Love it, Love it, Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not returnable, surprising from a Amazon vendor
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 12 of these bracelets as client gifts. One box did not have a bracelet in it. I don’t know how to contact the seller and found out they are not returnable. Another reviewer wrote it is not easy to resize them and that is true. And the instructions are cumbersome. A video would be helpful. The bracelet is beautiful but much thinner than I thought it was going to be for the price, which is higher than others offered on Amazon (so I thought it would be of higher quality yet the magnets are much smaller as well). As far as how it works that is yet to be determined.
customer_reviews.author: Marlie Waters

customer_reviews.title: Bracelet unusable because tool broke
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have the opportunity to actually test or use the product, because the link removal tool broke almost immediately. I took some links out but, with no tool, there was no way to reassemble and actually wear the bracelet. Extremely frustrating given the cost.
customer_reviews.author: JA in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Stunning and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on April 29th and it arrived May 2nd. The bracelet is gorgeous. It was well packaged, but the plastic on the bracelet is really difficult to take off. The bracelet fits me perfectly and I didn't have to remove any links. I brought it because of left wrist pain and weakness due to Surgery on 10/20/2015. Just looking for some relief. Hoping this helps. Read reviews before ordering and decided it's worth a try
customer_reviews.author: Chinita Maria

customer_reviews.title: Experienced a strong headache
customer_reviews.text: After using this bracelet for a couple of days I did not feel any difference. However, I needed to stop wearing it because I started with a strong headache that lasted until the following day no matter I took a pain pill. Not sure if it was related with the bracelet but I had never experienced a strong long lasting headache like that one. Disappointed that the company does not offer refunds and I did not read that information before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: We love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife. She has a bit of pain in arm. Too soon to see if there's a difference in healing, but the bracelet it beautiful. The "silver" is a little darker than silver, but still shines. The "gold" is beautiful too. She likes the way it feels. Light. Nice on skin. Beautiful as jewelry. I'll give an update if it changes her pain. Also, the bracelet adjustment tool didn't work too well. I thought it was me, but I bought another bracelet from the same company, they sent an adjuster for that, and that one worked better.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Magana

customer_reviews.title: Nice style and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a Magnetic bracelet for my husband, and then this one for me. The company is good to work with, can not tell results since I just got the bracelet a few days ago. I worn one years ago and got relief for a heel spur so this time I am trying it to see how it works for my back and legs. Even if it doesn't work, it is a nice bracelet to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret W. Lamm

customer_reviews.title: Quality not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a nice looking therapeutic bracelet and was excited to see this one at such a reasonable price. The bracelet arrived on time and included a tool to remove links if necessary. However, the quality of the bracelet was disappointing. It is very lightweight and the clasp only opens part way, making it difficult to remove. I would not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: BarbC

customer_reviews.title: Great Bracelet.
customer_reviews.text: Great bracelet, had to remove three links, was a little hard because the pins are so very small. But after I got it together its perfect, matches the necklace. Has helped my wrist already, have not taken it off since I put it on. Thank you carrying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try because my mom has a magnetic bracelet and said it helped with her arthritis. I liked the look of this one better than any of the others I considered buying. It goes with any outfit I wear or any jewelry I decide to wear because of the two tones in it. I wear it all the time & have noticed a decrease in my joint pain. I would purchase this again for myself or as a gift. It doesn't hurt to try it so if you're on the fence about it I think you should go for it.
customer_reviews.author: LauLau951

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and Functional Win Win
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these and wore for a while. Then I decided to give it to my 92 year old mother. After that my wrist was no longer pain free. I bought another one and this time sized it to fit almost snugly. I can wear it all the time and it stays as lovely as when I bought it. It is attractive enough to wear with my other gold bracelet. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Pain is still there but mobility improved.
customer_reviews.text: Wife: **update** My wrist pain is back and this time it's more painful than before. When I wore it at the very beginning I had this slight joint pain on all of my fingers. I think it lasted for about 15 minutes and then it went away. So far, the pain on my wrist is still there. But as far mobility is concerned, it definitely improved. Maybe I just need to wear it continuously, after all it has only been 5 days since I've worn it.
customer_reviews.author: Dae and Joo

customer_reviews.title: It's Working....That's All That Matters!
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet actually seems to be helping with the numbness in my hand. I'm not sure what's going on with my hand - carpal tunnel? Who knows? But this bracelet has significantly relieved the numbness. I sleep with it on. I wear it in the shower. It's quite attractive. What's not to love??
customer_reviews.author: Animal Lover

customer_reviews.title: ... titanium magnetic therapy bracelets roughly two weeks ago and love them. I sleep
customer_reviews.text: I'd purchased two (one for each wrist) of the elegant women's titanium magnetic therapy bracelets roughly two weeks ago and love them. I sleep, exercise and shower without removing them. I wear my doctors issued carpal tunnel braces (on each wrist) at night while sleeping along with my magnetic therapy bracelets beneath them. Since I've been using magnetic therapy, I've noticed a decrease in numbness in my fingers. Hopefully with continued use my results will be even better. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy when finding this one
customer_reviews.text: I have worn a magnetic bracelet for quite a while now but it was definitely looking worn which is why I wanted to find a new one. I was very happy when finding this one. The package, which was securing wrapped and arrived when I was told it would. The bracelet is absolutely beautiful. I have what a lot of jeweler would consider a larger wrist and yours fits great. Yes, I firmly believe it the healing nature of magnetic because since wearing my first one I can comfortably knit and crochet again. Yes, I would recommend it and am looking to see if a ring may also be available. Keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Eda Bernhardt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a magnetic therapy bracelet that someone gave me but it wasn't very stylish so I ordered one from this company. I love the bracelet and it looks very nice. The links were easy to adjust with the tool that comes with the bracelet. I have a little trouble opening and closing the clasp but otherwise I like the bracelet and the magnetic therapy has really helped my back and hip pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work! and they are pretty!
customer_reviews.text: My sister originally ordered the anklet for herself and when she discovered the anklet reduced the swelling in her ankles, she order one for her daughter. Her daughter had been suffering for some time with swollen ankles. Her daughter noticed immediate relief. That's when I got involved. I ordered an anklet and a bracelet and found relief from stiffness. I'm so convinced they work, that I ordered 5 more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my bracelet...it's very well made, the quality is excellent, and it's very attractive. The instructions for removing the links were easy to understand and the video available for viewing made the process even better. I'm one of those individuals who benefits from magnetic therapy and I'm happy to know your company is providing many quality bracelets for this purpose. Thank you...much success to you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and classy
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Looks good. True to the description. The two-toned is mostly gold looking. I'm glad it came with the tools to adjust it. I had to take out 4 links! Can't tell YET if it will provide any arthritis relief but it is a nice looking bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: Diane H

customer_reviews.title: Nothing change in my body
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me and change color too, I didn't return yet because you should use it at least for 2 months and then you can say what will haplen in your body, nothing change for me and it's late to return, I didn't contact to customer service yet
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: I think its helping
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet is attractive, easy to adjust size with device included, and well made. I believe my tendonitis is better! Its not gone but I have noticed an improvement.
customer_reviews.author: dragland

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and works as expected
customer_reviews.text: I recommend these bracelets. They are pretty, they look exactly as pictured. Great quality, easy to remove links! I wear different styles depending on whether I'm casual, work, evening, event, date .... and these are nice enough to wear for an event!
customer_reviews.author: ZnZsMama

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet is of high quality and the tool to remove links works like a charm. You do however need minifying glass to see how to use it,
customer_reviews.author: Martin F.

customer_reviews.title: Am really pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Am really pleased with my purchase. It is working already,I'm sure.plus it looks beautiful. My husband took two links out with the tool...no problem. The packaging was very good too,with a lovely little velvet pouch to put it in. It is far better than ones I had before. I would recommend it to my friends. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Barry/Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Hey!!.....this thing REALLY works!
customer_reviews.text: I always thought these bracelets were hocus pokus but my pain has definitely improved. I wear my bracelet 24/7 and am so glad I purchased it. Excellent quality and hypo allergenic. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Love my bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and fit of my Life Style Titanium Magnetic Bracelet. I needed help from the seller to open the clasp and they responded immediately. I removed the extra links per instructions and know my bracelet will relieve the arthritis .
customer_reviews.author: Queenie

customer_reviews.title: Giving it 5 stars as it is a beautiful bracelet and the seller so far has provided excellent ...
customer_reviews.text: Giving it 5 stars as it is a beautiful bracelet and the seller so far has provided excellent service. Shipping was fast. Instructions for removing links were thorough. It was super-easy to remove links. Response time for seller answering questions was very fast as well. I would definitely purchase from this seller again. As far as the bracelet helping with aches & pains, it's too early to tell. Only had the bracelet for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Boricua

customer_reviews.title: very nice looking bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I only had this bracelet for 3 days and it disappeared from my wrist! Don't know how that happened as I wasn't aware of catching it on anything that would have caused it to fall off. It may have been a faulty clasp. At any rate, I ordered another one in hopes that it would last a bit longer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Branch

customer_reviews.title: Love this bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Love this bracelet. Beautifully made and a quality piece. My husband easily used the tool provided to make it smaller for me. I have arthritis in my finger joints and I do believe the magnets are helping to lessen the pain considerably!
customer_reviews.author: Jane H.

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!
customer_reviews.text: Could be a placebo, but once I started wearing this, my headaches and migraines went away! Placebo or not, I’m wearing this and never taking it off. It is durable so I shower and workout in it without much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Useful and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: It has been helpful for pain in my thumb joint. It is also an attractive bracelet. I do have some problem with the clasp at times though.
customer_reviews.author: KMH

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful bracelet!
customer_reviews.text: It’s very beautiful and goes with most all jewelry! Clasp is very hard to open. Has helped with carpal tunnel pain so far. I wear it day & night!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Fields

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't easy to size it as I have small wrists but ...
customer_reviews.text: It does reduce the pain in my hand. It wasn't easy to size it as I have small wrists but a jewelry store fixed it for $2.00.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: We are happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: We are happy with the purchase, the bracelet and necklace are attractive and with the provided tool we were able to adjust the bracelet to the correct size. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Donald McCullough

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I love this bracelet. Very strong magnets. Beautiful design and easy instructions to remove links. I will buy another one when I can afford it. BEST quality bracelet I have ever bought for magnetic healing...Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Both ends broke off within days. Poor quality. Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Due to arthritis I have tried many others and this one is the best. Good quality, very simple, pretty and comfortable . I got a second one to wear on my other wrist because it really helps. Its so light weight I wear them all day everyday. I forget I even have them on. Im going to get my mom one now for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Kram Ufflernot

customer_reviews.title: We are very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.text: My wife is very pleased with this product. It looks elegant and pretty, and it is well-designed to last. The length is easy to adjust, with a neat little tool, included with the bracelet. Even the packaging, an attractive box, seems special.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Product works well. Their is a good size magnet on each link which I was happy to see !!!
customer_reviews.author: Edwina Jo Zuniga

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: I bought the necklace and the bracelet. I haven’t used it long enough to see if it works.
customer_reviews.author: Azi Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Try it, it can help somewhat with pain, beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, elegant, durable.... helps with relaxing your body. Helps somewhat with pain.
customer_reviews.author: SLB

customer_reviews.title: They work and this is good quality. Great service
customer_reviews.text: Really fast service and the magnetic bracelet is great. They really work. I have arthritis in both wrists and thumbs. I had one on my left and bought this one because my right started hurting. They stop the soreness and the aching. Good quality bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: randa renda

customer_reviews.title: the tool itself if cumbersome and not very user friendly to use and the end that actually removes and reinserts the pin bends ve
customer_reviews.text: This is a link item, meaning, you must remove the tiny pins that hold the links together in order to size the bracelet. The item comes with a "tool" to take out the pins and push them back in. The pins are extremely small and one needs very, very small fingers in order to line up the tool to the pin. Also, the tool itself if cumbersome and not very user friendly to use and the end that actually removes and reinserts the pin bends very easily, We finally did get is sized but not without a lot of angry and frustrating moments. If you buy this product, I would suggest taking it to jeweler to have it sized.
customer_reviews.author: Barryjoshua

customer_reviews.title: Bought another for mom and sister!!!
customer_reviews.text: From the first day, we slept better! We liked it so much, I came back and bought one for my Mom and Sister too!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen wheeler

customer_reviews.title: They loved it
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift and they love it and told me they definitely felt the pain relief from wearing it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Steinmann

customer_reviews.title: The pain is good
customer_reviews.text: I was in a lot of pain and hand were starting to swell. They arrived in time. After the first night the pain was gone. Now more pain and the swelling is gone. Plus they look like a regular bracelet. Need another now for my left hand and that necklace.
customer_reviews.author: Monique L. Watts

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: This is not a magnetic therapy bracelet. I've worn them before and this does not work at all
customer_reviews.author: lexlu

customer_reviews.title: It really works.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a couple of months and it has helped with my joint pain. I haven’t been doing anything different other than to wear this bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia A

customer_reviews.title: This bracelet works
customer_reviews.text: This is replacement of one I bought a long time ago. I love this bracelet. It looks and feels awesome. I’m sleeping great! Have energy and strength.
customer_reviews.author: Geralyne Scott

customer_reviews.title: Nice bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bracelet but have not noticed any improvement in joint discomfort. The small tool to remove links was useless. Had to have local jewelry store remove links. It’s very hard to remove from arm so I leave it on all of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Becky C.

customer_reviews.title: I love my new magnetic bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I love my new magnetic bracelet. It is very comfortable to wear, and doesn’t snap everything, like some bracelets do. It’s also pretty, and blends right in with my good jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and healing
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet is beautiful and comfortable. I have other copper and magnetic items but they are heavy and move on my wrist. I just got this three days ago but from the start it has been very comfortable and I don't even know I'm wearing it. Fitting this one to size was a little tricky for the first one but I got two others as gifts for family members and they were a snap to do. I will recommend this to all my friends even if they don't need the magnetic healing. It is a lovely piece of jewelry that also helps my aching fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Hummer927

customer_reviews.title: No pain!
customer_reviews.text: In less than 24 hours, my wrist stopped hurting. Easy to remove the extra links, the included tool works great. Wish I'd gotten one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Magnetic Therapy Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: It is an elegant looking bracelet. Resizing was quite easy with the tool provided (an added plus since it can be used for many different pieces of jewelry. It seems to work. I have tennis elbow which is not so bothersome and it also seems to have alleviated the short term pain of a flu shot. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sncwilly

customer_reviews.title: And I am glad I did
customer_reviews.text: This isn't the first magnetic bracelet I have ordered on line. The other bracelets were not what I expected. So, I was skeptical of ordering but I did! And I am glad I did! I finally have a magnetic bracelet that fits perfectly. Thank you for including the tool so I could easily adjust the bracelet for a perfect fit. I would not hesitate to wear the bracelet for casual or formal affairs. I will readily recommend this business to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Helps with the arthritis pain in my hands
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that the bracelet is able to be adjusted to fit well. This is my second one-now I have one for each hand. I used to take Aleve twice a day for the pain but since wearing this bracelet, I haven't taken any !! The cost is great and well worth it !! Thanks Smarter Lifestyle !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and very well made. I have already noticed an improvement in my elbow pain. I highly recommend this bracelet and trust me you will have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet is comfortable and dainty. I have very small wrists and was able to adjust this for a snug fit. I wear it all the time -- even in the shower. Has it alleviated my arthritis? No. But I do think it has helped.
customer_reviews.author: Roda46

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, awesome service, I needed a couple extra links, they responded immediately. Will recommend to my golf friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome McNulty

customer_reviews.title: Love this bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Love this bracelet. Very comfortable. I bought it to see if it would help with some circulation issues. Seems to be helping so far. And if not, it's stylish to wear anytime!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Cassar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: Cannot tell much in the way of pain, but the bracelet is attractive and easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Lewis

customer_reviews.title: My wife says the bracelet is reducing the pain in ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife says the bracelet is reducing the pain in her finger. Kind of early to say anything else. Seems to be working for her.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. Lentsch

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love the style and quality, looks like an expensive piece if jewelry
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J Roth

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not effective.
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet does not have the same effect as another magnetic bracelet I own has. I have been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love my bracelet! I broke my wrist almost a year ago and still had pain in it. A friend told me about magnetic therapy and I thought I'd give it a try. So, I now have minimal pain but I've only been wearing it for a few days so far. I am extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Spiegel

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as well for energy as other bracelets I purchased in the past
customer_reviews.author: Tricia A

customer_reviews.title: Good looking therapy?
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Whether it is just good looking jewelry or a therapeutic device is yet to be determined.
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: yes I was very happy with my bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, yes I was very happy with my bracelet. I had lost my other one I had for 15 years. It's a very well made bracelet. I am thinking of maybe ordering another one. I was so glad to find your company and as I said I am very happy. Thank you, Sheri C.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the bracelet but the latch is tough to get off without help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful bracelet. I especially like the clasp which is integrated within the links that I have no worries that it might accidentally come undone. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: JMcG

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet is very nice and was fairly easy to adjust. I have been wearing it for 2 week but have not notice any benefits yet. Will update after 4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: MCB

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for me caused swelling numbness in my fingers & had to remove within a week after 3 wks without wearing it still have numbness & swelling I’m afraid sorry wished for more positive feedback did anyone else get this numbness & pockets of swelling
customer_reviews.author: Brid Power

customer_reviews.title: as the tool that comes with it to adjust the size is useless and above all this item was not even eligible ...
customer_reviews.text: If the size does not fit well, u r just done, as the tool that comes with it to adjust the size is useless and above all this item was not even eligible for refund. So be careful before buying this item, else be ready to pay someone outside for adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: vishv verma

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me but still happy
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet came as expected. It's a wonderful concept and a nice bracelet, but other than that did not do anything to relieve my arthritis pain. Quite disappointing. I wore it snug on my wrist for 2 weeks and no pain relief. Smarter style was really helpful with customer service though and definitely stand behind their 100% garuntee.
customer_reviews.author: amy tran

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product...attractive and well made. This is our second purchase and we are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Den

customer_reviews.title: Health
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bracelet. Well made and beautiful. I haven't had it long but look forward to enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: pattyanna

customer_reviews.title: I love my new titanium braclet
customer_reviews.text: I love my new titanium braclet. It is great quality. I received it right on time and couldn't wait to put it on. I would order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: The bracelet was just what was depicted. Taking out ...
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet was just what was depicted. Taking out a pin to adjust the length was a bit tricky and the removal tool could have been a little stronger, but the reason, other than appearance, that I bought this bracelet was because it came with the removal tool. I would buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Pat M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lightweight but really sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful two-tone bracelet. I'm hoping it'll do for my wrists what the necklace has done for my neck.
customer_reviews.author: doglover

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the delivery service as well as the beauty of the two-tone bracelet. Easy to remove links using the tool provided with the order. I have been wearing the bracelet for slightly more than a week and the ache in my wrist and thumb has noticeably decreased.
customer_reviews.author: WVMountaineer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive bracelet
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive bracelet--good quality. With the tool provided, it was easy to remove links. Only have had the bracelet a few days so it's too early to write of any health benefits. But considered it worth trying since I have recently been diagnosed with arthritis in my right thumb and wrist. My brother had relief from arthritis pain using titanium magnetic therapy and highly recommended it. I have showered with it on and have worn while sleeping at night--don't even know I'm wearing. It's pretty enough that I will be able to wear it even when wearing other pieces of jewelry on my wrist. Plan to talk my husband into purchasing one since he often has wrist and elbow pain.
customer_reviews.author: JSBear

customer_reviews.title: My wife really likes it. Smarterlifestyle responded quickly to ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife really likes it. Smarterlifestyle responded quickly to our need for more pins (I misinterpreted the instructions for reinserting pins when removing links).
customer_reviews.author: Doc Link

customer_reviews.title: Happy With Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I love my magnetic bracelet. Doesn't look like the usual arthritis bracelets. I wear mine constantly even when taking a shower. Considering ordering one for my daughter who had neck surgery with metal in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE THE WAY IT FIT & LOOKED
customer_reviews.text: I LIKE THE WAY IT FIT & LOOKED, ONLY COMPLIANT IS THE CATCH COULDN'T BE LATCHED SO CAN'T BE WORN.
customer_reviews.author: woodsy

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic wrist therapy
customer_reviews.text: have wrist pain........lost my last bracelet...........this fits the bill, and my wrist. The magnets really work, and the bracelet is very attractive!
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Rizzon

customer_reviews.title: ... Carpel Tunnel on my right wrist but I do love the look
customer_reviews.text: I do not think this is helping my Carpel Tunnel on my right wrist but I do love the look!
customer_reviews.author: Janet L.Snook

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the bracelet works great and was easy to change out the links. Only thing that had a few issues was the tool to take out the links I had to tape because it kept falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B Southwick

customer_reviews.title: Closure is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Love the bracelet however the closure will not stay closed it keeps opening up so I can’t wear it without it coming off so disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Nettie R.

customer_reviews.title: 5 star quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality bracelet, extremely light which is so nice as I never take it off. Will probably purchase another one for my other wrist. Wore my previous magnetic bracelet since 2007 and it definitely helps with OA pain.
customer_reviews.author: Master K

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: The joint in my right thumb ached continously. I have been wearing my bracelet for 7 days. No pain. Range of motion has improved. It is pretty and looks dressy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging and fast shipment
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, style and fit. pain reduction and relief to be determined with time. thank you for your follow up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just really like this I might be crazy but feel like it has helped some of my aches and pains. Gave it 4 stars because putting the thing back together after taking the links out was aggravating and not easy.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great.
customer_reviews.text: Update: This bracelet works. Have ordered my second one and an ankle bracelet. Ankle bracelet helps relieve ankle and foot pain.Nice Looking Bracelet! Not sure if the magnetic benefits of the bracelet work yet. Just received it and will know more in a week or two.
customer_reviews.author: gavk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful as advertised. Rey pleased with the purchase and wife will love it for xmas.
customer_reviews.author: Obieone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very pretty and easy to adjust, very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Oxenreider

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one for my mom and me and we wear them every day.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the bracelet . It was easy to fit. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Tea

customer_reviews.title: Is There A Bracelet In Here?
customer_reviews.text: I like the bracelet very much and was able to shorten it fine However when I opened the box I didn't find the bracelet under the adjustment tool right away and thought it was missing. Box is all black inside.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Richards

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I have only worn bracelet for 2 days—-too soon to effectively analyze
customer_reviews.author: JEAN E. SEAVER

product_meta.title: Elegant Womens Titanium Magnetic Therapy Bracelet Pain Relief for Arthritis and Carpal Tunnel
feature_bullets: EXTRA STRENGTH: Powerful 3500 Gauss Magnets in each link. Don't waste time with weaker magnets. Reduce neuropathy pain, fatigue & muscle tension.

PURE TITANIUM: Handcrafted for the highest quality. Strong Clasp that stays put. Titanium is low maintenance! Length: 20cm; Width: 0.6cm; Used for sports aches in the neck, shoulders, arms, forearms, wrist, fingers and other joints.
STYLISH DESIGN: So stylish that no one would even suspect it is therapeutic! Different colors to match any attire, style & mood. Also used for migraines, tennis and golfer's elbow, & tendonitis.
100% HYPOALLERGENIC: Guaranteed to be Lead & Nickel free; No more allergic reactions commonly found with stainless steel and copper bracelets & bangles. Color: Silver & Gold

ELEGANT & CONVENIENT: Beautiful velvet gift bag and elegant gift box make a great present for most any occasion (Christmas / Xmas, birthday, anniversary) . Link Removal Tool (Instructions Included!) to adjust size in the comfort of your own home.
